News.Title: Akiko Global Services Reports 200% YoY Turnover Growth
News.Summary: Akiko Global Services shares gained 6% after reporting ₹17.44 crore December 2025 turnover, marking 200% YoY growth. Nine-month period showed 238% growth with strong partner ecosystem driving expansion.

News.Title: Akiko Global Services Partners With Transaction Analysts India for Digital Wallet Solutions
News.Summary: Akiko Global Services has formed a partnership with Transaction Analysts India to launch co-branded digital wallet solutions. The collaboration aims to develop digital payment products under both companies' brands.
